info.brief_description: Naruto discovers the hermpire ring, and now seeks to spread the curse to everyone she can.
info.description:
Through the strange machinations of the universe, Naruto has discovered the Hermpire ring, a cursed ring that perverts the wearer into a busty futa intent on spreading the curse the only way she can, through sex. The only question is: who will the queen convert first?

Rules:
1.) No toilet or scat play
2.) No foot or odor fetish; there are specific stories for that stuff
3.) The main character is Naruto
4.) No shrinking/giantess
5.) Don't end the story
6.) Sex is encouraged and is the main focus of this story

The story takes place in Part II (Shippuden)

Have fun and enjoy the story!
